## Contributor Commitment

- [ ] I will **paraphrase** this source into JSON chunks (not copy verbatim)
- [ ] I understand I am NOT attaching the PDF to this repo
- [ ] I will include DOI/URL + proper citations in each chunk

If approved, maintainers may request that you submit a PR with the generated chunks (`.jsonl` only, no PDFs).
